title: Game Progress Route
content:

If you choose the second one, she will suspect that you are familiar with the Archduke to know a private matter such as that. You will get the next choices:

I happened upon some of his correspondence that mentioned your dealings with him. We're old colleagues. We were lovers. It was all very steamy, I'm asking the questions here.
